ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.1_0: having sexual intercourse, what is a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.2_0: having sexual intercourse, he commits an offense entailing confession when three conditions are fulfilled:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.1_0: disrespect, a legal issue arising from feces, urine, vomit, or spit. And what is the legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water because of his there are an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:3.1_0: The sixth section for recitation on the legal issue is finished.
